questions.question: What is the primary purpose of R- Squered in regression analysis?

answers.a: To determine the no. of datapoints
answers.b: To measure the proportion of varience explained by the model
answers.c: To calculate the slope of the regression line
answers.d: To indetify outliers in the dataset

questions.question: In weighted least squared regression, what does assigning different weights to data points typically indicate?

answers.a: The complexity of the mathematical calculation
answers.b: The relative importance or reliability of each data ponit
